title: Automated extraction of functional biomarkers of verbal and ambulatory ability from multi-institutional clinical notes using large language models

abstract: Background Functional biomarkers in neurodevelopmental disorders, such as verbal and ambulatory abilities, are essential for clinical care and research activities. Treatment planning, intervention monitoring, and identifying comorbid conditions in …
